00036 #include "kernel-phase-acq.h"
00037 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
00038 #include <mpi.h>
00039 #include "seq-mpi.h" /* for MPI TAGS definition */
00040 #endif
00041 
00050 void KernelPhase(EXPERIENCE3D * expr, EVENT * event)
00051 {
00052     int ix, iy, iz;
00053     float sgn[3];
00054     int  xmin;
00055     int xmax;
00056 
00057 #ifdef HAVE_MPI
00058     if (expr->mpi_slice_x0 == -1) {
00059    xmin = 0;
00060    xmax = expr->nfovx;
00061     } else {
00062    xmin=expr->mpi_slice_x0;
00063    xmax=xmin+mpi_get_slice_width(expr, xmin);
00064     }
00065 #else
00066     xmin = 0;
00067     xmax = expr->nfovx;
00068 #endif
00069     /* 
00070      * Do a one point acquisition
00071      */
00072 
00073     sgn[0] = 0.;
00074     sgn[1] = 0.;
00075     sgn[2] = 0.;
00076 
00077     if (event->op_flag == PLUS)
00078    for (ix = xmin; ix < xmax; ix++)
00079        for (iy = 0; iy < expr->nfovy; iy++)
00080       for (iz = 0; iz < expr->nfovz; iz++) {
00081           sgn[0] += (float) expr->magstate[0][ix][iy][iz];
00082           sgn[1] += (float) expr->magstate[1][ix][iy][iz];
00083           sgn[2] += (float) expr->magstate[2][ix][iy][iz];
00084     } else
00085    for (ix = xmin; ix < xmax; ix++)
00086        for (iy = 0; iy < expr->nfovy; iy++)
00087       for (iz = 0; iz < expr->nfovz; iz++) {
00088           sgn[0] -= (float) expr->magstate[0][ix][iy][iz];
00089           sgn[1] -= (float) expr->magstate[1][ix][iy][iz];
00090           sgn[2] -= (float) expr->magstate[2][ix][iy][iz];
00091       }
00092     expr->sgn[0][event->nu_pointx][event->nu_pointy][event->nu_pointz]+=sgn[0];
00093     expr->sgn[1][event->nu_pointx][event->nu_pointy][event->nu_pointz]+=sgn[1];
00094     expr->sgn[2][event->nu_pointx][event->nu_pointy][event->nu_pointz]+=sgn[2];
00095 }
